Reviews.Author: Zack
Reviews.Content: Gigantic venue... Lots of dance room.. Amazingly priced drinks and music is nothing like any other club in Las Vegas!!.. This is the place to be in gayvegas!!

Reviews.Author: Erica
Reviews.Content: I can't say enough good things about Krush! First off the music is amazing!! Dj Corona keeps us dancing from the minute We step in till We leave (usually Closing time). The bartenders never leave you waiting very attentive and nice. Gorgeous go-go's who even take the time to teach this girl how to perfect her twerk the owner Christian makes us feel Like VIP's every time checking in with us to make sure we are having a great time! My husband and I prefer Krush over any straight club hands down!!!

Reviews.Author: A
Reviews.Content: Terrible place! On Thursday, me and some friends decided to check out this place. Discovered that they open at 10pm, so we decided to go to Charlie's before to pregame. Had a great time there, but we decided to head over to Krush not too far away. We get there and they ask us for ID and metal detector check us, which I appreciate. The place was almost empty, and didn't really look like a nice club at that, we wanted to have a drink and walk around. We get to the bar, and the bartender kind of ignored us for 10 or 15 minutes, and when he finally got to us, I asked for one of their signature cocktails and after going to the other tender to ask about it, clearly he had no idea, he said they didn't have the ingredients for it. My friend asked for a glass of wine, he turned around, opened a few door and drawers confused and said they had no wine. So we get just a regular vodka cocktail, and when I gave him my card, he said that the bar is cash only. Seriously? So we left and went back to Charlie's where the staff was super nice, we got our drinks, and could pay with a card. I will not be back to Krush, and will encourage my friends and clients (I'm a concierge) to skip this mess of a place.

Reviews.Author: B
Reviews.Content: Beautiful venue, great drinks and prices. The staff is very friendly, Electrica is very friendly and a highlight of my night was meeting her and Marcus the gogo. Krush is a definite place to go while in vegas.

Reviews.Author: Thomas Chase Leo
Reviews.Content: Krush, the customer service, excellent. The cocktail waitresses excellent. The dancers were unbelievable. The hosts gorgeous. The music fantastic. Thank you to everyone on the dance floor. Your combined energy made our party such a blessing - We had the best time drinking and dancing at Krush. We arrived late with a birthday boy turning 21 years old and you took care of us like no other club with buckets of champagne, vodka, drinks, cranberry juice, pineapple, music, we had our own private cocktail waitresses with a dancer on the stage next to us. The dancers were sweet. They took photos with all of us during their break. Seductive lyrics, great moves, excellent music: Thank you to the amazing team at Krush for the best party Labor Day Weekend 2016. I would return every week if I could. Each person I spoke to felt the same way. They all agreed that we had the best time dancing with our party at Krush.

Reviews.Author: Kay
Reviews.Content: Omg, best gay club I've been to in awhile.. So fun! The drag show is awesome & so is the bar staff, and wes is a cutie ;)

Reviews.Author: Alex
Reviews.Content: Love this place! Cocktails are really good and in a decent price. I was so surprised how they lowered the platform for the drag show! Nobody else in town can really compare.

Reviews.Author: Robert
Reviews.Content: Huge venue, danced the night away. They had a limo service pick up 10 of us from Treasure Island, we were greeted and sat immediately in a our VIP area, great service.  The drag queen runway was hot! The gogo dancers really know how to work it. I will definitely be back for a great time. Highly suggest if you wanna dance and have a great time. And their prices are really great! Thank you to the friendly staff.

Reviews.Author: Laura
Reviews.Content: great atmosphere! friendly staff and crazy talented and sexy gogo's. the drag queens were super fun too! one thing i really like is the club has lots of security and made my group feel very safe

Reviews.Author: Raechel
Reviews.Content: Absolutely love this place. The bartenders are sweet and very creative with their drinks. I asked one bartender to  surprise me  and he made me his own creation & I ordered that for the rest of the night. The atmosphere is so chill, someplace I can go with my friends and relax or get down to some dope music. I highly recommend this place to anyone.

Reviews.Author: Wes
Reviews.Content: Love this club! Amazing employees, great atmosphere, and the drinks are cheap! I would recommend this club to anyone who want to have a great time without making a dent in your wallet!..... Sad to see bad reviews on $2 Thursday's, drinks can't come at a better price with such a nice and attractive bartenders! If you're giving this place a bad review then stay home.

Reviews.Author: Sani
Reviews.Content: Kush las vegas is the new and also the best place in town with the best prices for drinks.....also bottle service and hookah. They even have a great free limo service that will pick you up at your hotel and back to your hotel.....if you are going to las vegas ot live in Vegas this the place to be, they are open from Wednesday to sunday....definitely KRUSHING it...
